text:
@RahulGandhi Corruption in the time of a National Crisis :

🔺PMCARES : No information about usage of funds. Self audit, instead of CAG audit.

🔺COVID19 Test Kit Scam : Govt bought overpriced AND faulty test kits from China. Who got the kickbacks?

#BJPCoronaCorruption
